snippet: Shares have risen about 34 percent since the company announced a surprisingly strong earnings report last week.
abstract: Facebook's stock crosses important psychological barrier, trading above $38 a share, price at which social network first sold shares to public in May 2012; shares have risen about 34 percent since it announced surprisingly strong earnings report.
lead_paragraph: Shares have risen about 34 percent since the company announced a surprisingly strong earnings report last week.

headline.main: Facebook Shares Touch a Symbolic Threshold
headline.print_headline: Facebook Shares Touch A Symbolic Threshold
